## Matrix.addAtIndex() method

add a value at the specified position in the current Matrix

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addAtIndex(index: number, value: number): Matrix;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  index | <code>number</code> | the index of the value within the matrix. between 0 and 15. |
|  value | <code>number</code> | the value to be added |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Matrix`

the current updated matrix
